headline: UBS Lowers American Tower (AMT) Price Target, BMO Capital Downgrades Rating
summary: American Tower Corporation (NYSE:AMT) is one of the 12 Best 5G Stocks to Invest in According to Hedge Funds. On January 20, UBS reduced its price target on American Tower Corporation (NYSE:AMT) from $260 to $254 and kept its Buy rating. The firm believes that the risk-reward outlook for tower companies looks favorable in 2026. […]

headline: Is American Tower (AMT) Pricing Reflect Recent REIT Concerns Or Offer Long Term Value Potential
summary: If you are wondering whether American Tower's current share price lines up with its underlying worth, you are not alone. This article focuses on what the numbers say about value. At a last close of US$178.75, the stock has seen a 2.6% decline over the past 7 days, a 1.3% gain over 30 days, and a 2.3% return year to date, with returns around 0% over the past year and declines of 10.4% and 9.0% over 3 and 5 years. Recent news flow around American Tower has centered on its role in the real...

headline: American Tower (AMT) Valuation Reassessed After Analyst Downgrade And DISH Uncertainty
summary: Recent analyst moves around American Tower (AMT) have put the company back in focus, as BMO Capital's downgrade and DISH related concerns contrast with more constructive views from several other research firms. See our latest analysis for American Tower. At a share price of $178.75, American Tower has seen a 1.02% 1 day share price return but a 5.79% 90 day share price decline, while its 5 year total shareholder return of 8.95% and 3 year total shareholder return of 10.41% declines suggest...
